department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Repairs to qimugjuk building roof, Iqaluit, Nunavut
description: Work of this Contract comprises repair of existing skylights, roofing and cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Contract Information
EW038-231922 - Qimugjuk Building Roof Repair, Iqaluit, Nunavut

#### Contract Description
The contractor will be required to repair existing skylights, roofing, and cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut. Bids must be submitted by May 2, 2023 at 14:00:00. Failure to meet this deadline may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  ## Step 1: Understand the contract details
The contractor provided a rough translation of the document. We have broken down the key details into sections for easier understanding.
